properties.name: Florence
properties.description: Posted by PaulbolandSecond stop in Italy trip 2006 with Joe. Very laid back with lots to do. David is here.

properties.name: Home in Oxford
properties.description: Posted by PaulbolandAlan Bullock Close, my home away from home.

properties.name: John Radcliffe Hospital
properties.description: Posted by PaulbolandÂ This is the hospital where I study and go to class.

properties.name: London
properties.description: Posted by PaulbolandJolly old London. I try to get here as much as possible. Marker points to Victoria Station, where the main coach terminal is.

properties.name: Milan
properties.description: Posted by PaulbolandJoe and I flew in here on Italy trip 2006 when our we missed our Ryan Air flight and had to reschedule. What a mistake! We then went straight to Venice by train.

properties.name: My Home
properties.description: Posted by PaulbolandMy Home. Curling, Newfoundland

properties.name: Radclife Infirmary, Birthplace of penicillin!
properties.description: Posted by PaulbolandFor all you medical geeks, penicillin was isolated here!

properties.name: Rome and the Vatican
properties.description: Posted by PaulbolandIncredible place. So much to do here. The Colosseum was incredible. The Vatican was breathtaking. Last stop on Italy Trip 2006.

properties.name: St. John's College
properties.description: Posted by PaulbolandThis is my college. This is where the bops happen. And it\'s 450 years old or something.

properties.name: Stratford Upon Avon
properties.description: Posted by PaulbolandStratford-upon-Avon, EnglandBeautiful town. Birthplace of Shakespeare. Rikki and I went here to see a Henry V, which turned out to be in Italian!

properties.name: Venice
properties.description: Posted by PaulbolandAbsolutely beautiful, but expensive as hell. First stop on Italy Trip 2006 with Joe. Next stop, Florence.
